Package org.openni.android

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OpenNIHelper.DeviceOpenListener
    Used for receiving the result of OpenNIHelper.requestDeviceOpen(String uri, DeviceOpenListener listener).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OpenNIHelper
    Provides facilities needed for using OpenNI in Android applications.
    OpenNIView
    A View that displays OpenNI streams.
